A group of South Carolina lawmakers stood on the steps of their state Capitol on Wednesday to encourage Mike Pence to run for president. It's not a complicated message, but it's a heartfelt one, said state Dick Armey Kris Crawford. ''We would like him on the ballot.'' Leaders of the conservative movement made the same argument in a letter sent to Mike Pence this week.
